title: Late News
creator_credit: Victoria. Office of Intellectual Disability Services. Early Intervention Resource Unit
brief_description: Highlights the impact a late diagnosis of a developmental delay has on parents and the family. The program illustrates how early intervention services provide information, support, resources and individual programs in order to promote a child’s development.
